short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily send Curae applications to patients by email without leaving your EHR and PM systems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Curae Connect, you can send Curae patient finance applications directly to your patients without leaving your EHR or PM system. In your browser, there will be a small "Curae" icon on the top of your Chrome window. All you have to do is click it and enter the patient email address. The patient will receive the application, and you will be notified by email once they have completed the application process. Before sending the first application, you'll need to enter your Curae username and password into the extension options page.
